bibl.title: An Inscribed Tomb Chamber in Ukma-West.
Nubian Voices II. New Texts and Studies on Christian Nubian Culture

bibl.note: Crosses and Greek inscriptions (first and last verses of the four Gospel) painted on the inner walls of the burial chamber of tomb 5 in the cemetery B of Ukma-West.
bibl.seg: Adam Łajtar & Jacques van der Vliet, An Inscribed Tomb Chamber in Ukma-West.

Adam Łajtar, Grzegorz Ochała & Jacques van der Vliet (edd.), Nubian Voices II. New Texts and Studies on Christian Nubian Culture = The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume XXVII (Warsaw, 2015) pp. 103-118, 1 tabl., 10 figg.
Crosses and Greek inscriptions (first and last verses of the four Gospel) painted on the inner walls of the burial chamber of tomb 5 in the cemetery B of Ukma-West.
